title: Coinbase Says Canadian License Makes It Country's Biggest Registered Crypto Exchange
description: Coinbase's expansion into Canada has cleared the hurdle of a "restricted dealer" registration, the company said on Thursday, making it the biggest registered crypto exchange in that jurisdiction.
